akn:section.akn:heading: Withdrawal of registration of registered foreign entity.

akn:content.akn:p: A registered foreign entity may withdraw its registration by delivering a statement of withdrawal to the Mayor for filing. The statement of withdrawal shall be signed by the entity and state:

After the withdrawal of the registration of an entity, service of process in any action or proceeding based on a cause of action arising during the time it was registered to do business in the District may be made pursuant to ยง 29-104.12.
